task: Launch a multi-faceted digital strategy for a luxury fashion brand's anniversary, integrating advanced AI for personalized marketing, orchestrating an international virtual exhibition of timeless collections, securing partnerships with eco-friendly advertisers, and implementing a strategy for data-driven future growth through big data analysis.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: Primary interface managing the digital strategy launch for the fashion brand's anniversary, coordinating tasks among agents.

agents.name: digital_strategy_manager
agents.role: Orchestrates the overall strategy ensuring integration of AI for personalized marketing and seamless execution.

agents.name: personalized_marketing_team
agents.role: Develops and implements AI-driven marketing strategies tailored for individual consumers.

agents.name: machine_learning_specialist_agent
agents.role: Designs machine learning models to predict and understand consumer preferences.

agents.name: ai_modeling_agent
agents.role: Crafts AI models for customized consumer engagement and enhanced brand interaction.

agents.name: consumer_preference_predictor_agent
agents.role: Predicts consumer trends and preferences using AI models.

agents.name: virtual_exhibition_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Manages the virtual exhibition showcasing historical and contemporary collections.

agents.name: digital_design_team
agents.role: Creates digital experiences for the virtual exhibition.

agents.name: interactive_showcase_designer_agent
agents.role: Designs interactive elements and showcases for the virtual event.

agents.name: eco_partner_relations_agent
agents.role: Secures partnerships with eco-friendly brands and advertisers to support the campaign's sustainability goals.

agents.name: sustainable_brand_negotiator_agent
agents.role: Negotiates terms with eco-friendly brands ensuring compliance with green policies.

agents.name: green_policy_compliance_agent
agents.role: Ensures all partnership activities comply with environmental standards.

agents.name: big_data_analysis_team
agents.role: Analyzes large datasets to derive insights for future growth.

agents.name: data_collection_specialist_agent
agents.role: Collects and organizes data from various sources for analysis.

agents.name: future_growth_strategy_planner_agent
agents.role: Develops strategies for sustainable growth based on data insights.

agents.name: tech_infrastructure_agent
agents.role: Oversees the technology infrastructure ensuring reliability and security.

agents.name: cloud_service_manager_agent
agents.role: Manages cloud computing resources for scalable and secure operations.

agents.name: network_security_officer_agent
agents.role: Ensures security and integrity of digital platforms used in the campaign.

agents.name: resilience_planner_agent
agents.role: Plans for resilience and disaster recovery to keep services running smoothly.

agents.name: brand_ambassador_outreach_agent
agents.role: Reaches out to potential celebrity brand ambassadors for collaboration.

agents.name: celebrity_collaboration_negotiator
agents.role: Facilitates agreements with celebrities ensuring alignment with brand vision.

agents.name: brand_alignment_researcher_agent
agents.role: Researches and ensures that all ambassadors align with the brand's core values.

tools.name: data_collection_specialist_agent
tools.description: Collects and organizes data from various sources to enable comprehensive analysis.

data_sources.description: List of sources from which to collect data

tools.name: network_security_officer_agent
tools.description: Oversees the security measures and integrity of digital operations in the campaign.

threat_detection_capabilities.description: If there are capabilities for threat detection in place

audit_frequencies.description: Number of audits scheduled per year
